---
name: Event Template
about: Template used to manage an event
title: "[Event] -context here-"
labels: event
assignees: ohubaut

---

## Task List

### Preparation

- [ ] Find speaker(s)
- [ ] Find location (if needed)
- [ ] Determine date
- [ ] Announce event on Meetup.com
- [ ] Promote on social media

### After the event

- [ ] Send mail to attendees to wrap up
- [ ] Shoutouts on social media
- [ ] Share content (slides / video / images) if/when available
- [ ] Promote next event (If available)

## Context and additional details
